    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public static javax.tools.DiagnosticCollector<javax.tools.JavaFileObject> compile(java.lang.String qualifiedName,
                                                                  java.lang.String sourceCode)
        Does the required object initialization and compilation.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - The qualified name of the class to compile.
        sourceCode - The source code to compile.
        Returns:
        if there were compilation errors: a DiagnosticCollector containing Diagnostics detailing the errors; otherwise, null.

      • loadAlgorithm

        public static Algorithm loadAlgorithm(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Loads the class with the given name as an Algorithm, and returns an instance of it.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the qualified name of the class to load.
        Returns:
        an Algorithm object representing the desired algorithm.
